mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_admin_room(a_r_name, a_r_state, a_r_price, a_r_check_in, a_r_check_out, a_r_count, a_r_content, a_r_image, a_r_reg_date, a_r_mod_date, a_acc_no) SELECT #{a_r_name}, #{a_r_state}, #{a_r_price}, #{a_r_check_in}, #{a_r_check_out}, #{a_r_count}, #{a_r_content}, #{a_r_image}, NOW(), NOW(), a_acc_no FROM tbl_admin_accommodation WHERE a_acc_no = #{a_acc_no}
